title: Now that i'm in gold...
body:
http://i.imgur.com/ZN0wU2N.gif
http://i.imgur.com/MH6Yjvh.png

At least now i can say i'm a true boosted monkey!
https://media.giphy.com/media/jnuHYICsHvbWg/giphy.gif

replies.body:
Well, if you would have sticked to Morde you might have reached Diamond :^)

Seriously though, congrats, you're now a true boosted animal so I hope you're going to build Protobelt in every single one of your games.

Well at the very least my rank is more metal than yours. 

:^)

Every game? so that means {{item:3152}} on {{champion:62}}?

 http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_me4of2Wg7H1ry10fwo1_500.gif
Upvoted for Universe 1 Bender with appropriate catch phrase.

I went from challenged to gold.

I honestly can't tell the difference.

Congrats!

My first season in gold as well. Honestly it still feels like challenged elo but at least we get  an extra reward this season :).

Personally the games feel a lot more chill overall, which is nice. Like we all still bad but at least a portion of players seem content with their rank so when getting stomped we just shut up and try our best rather than flame all game. Not everyone/every game is completely toxic free but it does seem better than silver/bronze and even some of the higher elos (according to reddit/boards), as far as toxicity goes.

My gold experience earlier the season: Gold V easy, Gold IV easy, Gold III easy, Gold II okay, Gold I hell.
Also just dropped from plat 4 hope i can get it back until the ranked Season ends
Just got into my Gold promo, hoping I have the same luck
Now that you're in gold, get ready for teammates worse than you ever had in bronze.
